mapper.update: UPDATE sum_no_tb a, ( SELECT a.sum sum_no, count(1) cnt, count(1)/b.cnt*100 rate FROM win_no_tb a , (SELECT count(1) cnt FROM win_no_tb) b GROUP BY a.sum ) b SET a.win_cnt = b.cnt, a.win_rate = b.rate WHERE a.sum_no = b.sum_no

UPDATE ODD_RATE_TB a, (select odd_cnt, max(drw_no) drw_no, count(1) cnt from win_no_tb group by odd_cnt) b, (select count(1) cnt from win_no_tb) c SET a.win_cnt = b.cnt, a.win_rate = b.cnt/c.cnt*100, a.last_drw_no = b.drw_no WHERE a.odd_cnt = b.odd_cnt

UPDATE ball_no_tb A ,(SELECT ball_NO1 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO1 ) B1 ,(SELECT ball_NO2 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO2 ) B2 ,(SELECT ball_NO3 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO3 ) B3 ,(SELECT ball_NO4 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO4 ) B4 ,(SELECT ball_NO5 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO5 ) B5 ,(SELECT ball_NO6 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO6 ) B6 SET seq1_cnt = B1.CNT, seq2_cnt= B2.CNT, seq3_cnt= B3.CNT, seq4_cnt= B4.CNT, seq5_cnt= B5.CNT, seq6_cnt= B6.CNT WHERE A.BALL_NO = B1.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B2.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B3.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B4.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B5.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B6.NO

UPDATE BALL_NO_RATE_TB A LEFT JOIN (SELECT ball_NO1 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO1 ) B1 ON A.ball_no = B1.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT ball_NO2 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO2 ) B2 ON A.ball_no = B2.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT ball_NO3 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO3 ) B3 ON A.ball_no = B3.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT ball_NO4 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO4 ) B4 ON A.ball_no = B4.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT ball_NO5 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO5 ) B5 ON A.ball_no = B5.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT ball_NO6 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_NO6 ) B6 ON A.ball_no = B6.NO, (select count(1) drwNo from win_no_tb ) C SET A.no1_rslt_cnt = nvl(B1.cnt,0), A.no1_rslt_rate = A.no1_rslt_cnt / C.drwNo * 100, A.no2_rslt_cnt = nvl(B2.cnt,0), A.no2_rslt_rate = A.no2_rslt_cnt / C.drwNo * 100, A.no3_rslt_cnt = nvl(B3.cnt,0), A.no3_rslt_rate = A.no3_rslt_cnt / C.drwNo * 100, A.no4_rslt_cnt = nvl(B4.cnt,0), A.no4_rslt_rate = A.no4_rslt_cnt / C.drwNo * 100, A.no5_rslt_cnt = nvl(B5.cnt,0), A.no5_rslt_rate = A.no5_rslt_cnt / C.drwNo * 100, A.no6_rslt_cnt = nvl(B6.cnt,0), A.no6_rslt_rate = A.no6_rslt_cnt / C.drwNo * 100
